title: Hard to clean
body: Whatever I fry in this air fryer, it gets stuck on the container, and becomes very hard to wash it off

title: Difficult to remove stains
body: Just after using this product 2 times, the container got stained badly

title: Long Lasting
body: I have been using this product for over an year now. Still works perfectly

title: Good Quality
body: Its been 6 months, and still the product works as promised
